record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME

speaking.paragraph: I understand that S. 1312, introduced earlier today by Senator DeMint and others, is at the desk, and I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will read the bill by title for the first time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: I now ask for its second reading and object to my own request.
